short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translating Franko To Arabic And Vice Versa

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Franko - عربي: Your Assistant for Translating Arabic to Franko and Vice Versa!

Nowadays, many individuals use Franko as a way to write Arabic words. That's where Franko - عربي comes in to support you. This extension is designed to help you understand Franko text.
